issue.subject: GXP uses external resources (EXT sprites) from HTTP cachefly CND
issue.description:
GXP uses external resources (EXT sprites) from HTTP CND.
Problem is on HTTPS we end up with a "mixed content" page which results on a browser warning or a non functional page.

I see two solutions (both hack GXP CSS files):
- use cachefly HTTPS URL
- use local ext resources (we have the in joomla\easysdi\com_easysdi_core\src\administrator\libraries\ext\resources)

I suggest using the second solution and do not rely on cachefly.

!cachefly-resources.png!
